TopicTitle: Top Game (A Top Gear Parody) - Landspeed Record Challenge !

Articles.Content:
Here is Episode 7 of Top Gear in Game, the Top Gear parody in game! Tonight, we attempt to beat the Landspeed Record, review some Dodge thing and even have a Little 'News!' All in this parody of Top Gear!
